title: Plat/Diamond ADC looking for support
body:
Hey, i'm an ADC that would like to try duoing with someone around plat/diamond who plays support fairly aggressively. 

Just looking to build some synergy and have some fun, friendly semi-tryhard gameplay.

IGNs: Soadiiebro [Silver smurf]
          Soadiie [Plat main]

replies.body: im a p3, 1t xerath support. as far as aggression goes lets talk. xerath sup thrives with an aggressive carry while playing back, controlling vision and dropping real nukes. im a tryhard with good attitude.

Hey, Plat JG/Support main here. I'd be keen.
Added your main.
